alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Pope; Saline; Union; Williamson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 9:28AM CDT until May 07 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Union County in southern Illinois... Northwestern Pope County in southern Illinois... Northern Johnson County in southern Illinois... Southern Williamson County in southern Illinois... Southwestern Saline County in southern Illinois... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 927 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crainville, or near Carterville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marion, Harrisburg, Carterville, Crainville, Energy, Goreville, Creal Springs, Carrier Mills, Lake Of Egypt Area, Stonefort, Williamson County Regional Airport and New Burnside. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 8. Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 39 and 54. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
